sentence.Network_en: This argument is only too blatantly an alibi for domestic repression.
sentence.Network_cn: 这一辩解完全是在为国内的镇压活动开脱。

sentence.Network_en: They said the song blatantly encouraged the killing of policemen.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们说这首歌明目张胆地煽动杀害警察。

sentence.Network_en: For years, blatantly false assertions have gone unchallenged.
sentence.Network_cn: 多年来，一些明显错误的断言都没有受到质疑。

PerfectNetExp.abs: blatant 喧嚣的blatantly 喧闹地blather 罗罗嗦嗦
They blatantly violated the laws ., 他们公然违反了法律.
therefore ringside towel Bao Shou picture gradually many , " I hate you " the manifesto also already blatantly printed on the wrister .于是场边毛巾包首的画面渐渐多了起来，“我恨你们”的宣言也已经公然地印在了护腕上。
They walked grandly through the lobby , blatantly arm in arm , pretending they were not defeated., 他们大大方方地穿过门厅 , 故意炫耀地挎着胳膊 , 假装他们没有被打败.

list.abs: O ? ? ? only 25 % of participants refused to be swayed by the majority's blatantly false judgement on all of the 12 trials .在所有12次试验中只有25%的被试拒绝受到主流的、明显错误的判断的影响。
they blatantly violated the laws .他们公然违反了法律.
to overlook any but the most blatantly forged papers ., 任何忽视 , 但最公然伪造文件.
you posted a blatantly obvious troll ., 你发了一个极其显然的导火索.

entry.def: Blatantly is used to add emphasis when you are describing states or situations which you think are bad.

example.ex: It became blatantly obvious to me that the band wasn't going to last...
example.tran: 我觉得很明显该乐队长久不了。

example.ex: For years, blatantly false assertions have gone unchallenged...
example.tran: 多年来，一些明显错误的断言都没有受到质疑。

auth_sentence.content: It is quite quite blatantly apparent and observable.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is quite quite blatantly apparent and observable.

auth_sentence.content: It is blatantly obvious that change is needed.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is blatantly obvious that change is needed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is blatantly obvious that change is needed.

auth_sentence.content: Ministers are claiming things that are blatantly untrue.
auth_sentence.res_content: Ministers are claiming things that are blatantly untrue.

sentences.en: blatantly contravening the rules of civilized warfare
sentences.cn: 公然违反文明战争的原则

sentences.en: Safety guidelines had been blatantly ignored.
sentences.cn: 安全规章被公然置之不顾。
